DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Expressive writing may help relieve symptom improve quality life breast cancer survivor chronic lymphedema . PURPOSE : This clinical trial study expressive write improve quality life woman breast cancer lymphedema .
DOC.brief_title: Expressive Writing Improving Quality Life Patients With Breast Cancer Lymphedema
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - To determine expressive write improves quality life ( QOL ) relative control condition breast cancer survivor chronic stage II lymphedema . - To determine expressive write improves physical psychological symptoms/outcomes ( i.e. , fatigue , psychological distress , activity level , confidence body ) relative control condition breast cancer survivor chronic lymphedema . Secondary - To explore influence individual difference variable ( dispositional optimism , emotional intelligence , repressive coping ) outcomes associate intervention include identification subset individual expressive write effective . - To explore influence intrusive/avoidant thinking mediator intervention outcomes QOL physical psychological symptom . OUTLINE : Patients randomize 1 2 treatment group . Patients travel School Nursing Vanderbilt University meet team member home another private location initial visit . Patients complete questionnaire , measure height weight data , arm fluid measurement . - Expressive write group : Twenty minute day , twice week 2 week , patient write deep thought feeling regard lymphedema treatment . - Daily diary group ( control ) : Twenty minute day , twice week 2 week patient write manage time . Patients complete quality-of-life questionnaire periodically . After completion study , patient follow 1 , 3 , 6 month .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Women undergone prior surgery and/or radiotherapy breast cancer No metastatic disease Must lymphedema , meet following condition : Stage II disease Swelling unrelieved elevation , arm may hard , may pit pressure , skin change take place Received prior professional treatment lymphedema Requires lifelong , home selfcare ( e.g. , compression sleeve ) No history bilateral lymphedema prohibit extracellular fluid comparison unaffected limb PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Inclusion criterion : Able read , write ( 20 minute ) , speak English Willing able drive study site agree see outpatient setting ( e.g. , private therapist office , outpatient clinic , physicians office , home ) Exclusion criterion : Has medical condition could cause edema , include follow : Symptomatic congestive heart failure Chronic/acute renal disease Cor pulmonale Nephrotic syndrome Nephrosis Liver failure Cirrhosis Pregnant expect become pregnant course study Unable stand upright measurement height weight Has metal implant , internal defibrillator , pacemaker History suicide attempt No recent suicidal ideation ( within last 6 month ) PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : See Disease Characteristics No concurrent intravenous chemotherapy radiotherapy active cancer No concurrent antipsychotic medication ( i.e. , haldol , thorazine , stelazine )
